185976039.review:
[h1] Самая переоценённая игра в мире [/h1]
После прохождения данного продукта игросодержащего, появляется ощущение того, что где-то меня загазлайтили. Если Вы что-то и слышали об этой игре, то, скорее всего, что это один из лучших инди-хорроров. Очень положительные оценки в Стиме лишь подтверждают это заявление, но так ли всё [i] радужно [/i]? [spoiler] (Нет, игра ж в сепии) [/spoiler]

[h2] Ложка мёда в бочке чернил [/h2]
Было бы несправедливо не указать плюсы данного проекта, которые у него несомненно имеются. Озвучка норм, музыка хорошая, задумка вообще замечательная, на этом плюсы, к сожалению, заканчиваются. 

[h2] Минусы [/h2]

[h3] Графика [/h3]
Многие думают, что графоний-полигоний дело вкуса, и, будут совершенно правы, до тех пор, пока графика активно не мешает геймплею. Единственные два цвета, существующее в этой игре: чёрный и грязно-жёлтый (плюс оттенки), на этом всё, никакой адекватной работы со светотенью, всё окружение сливается в жижу цвета говна и мочи, что делает все локации внешне идентичными, а сюжетные предметы прекрасно со всем этим "великолепием" сливаются, аки вьетнамцы с деревьями или финские снайперы со снегом. Заблудиться здесь очень просто, казалось бы, для хоррора идеально, но...

[h3] Хоррор-составляющая [/h3]
Её нет. [spoiler] (Местные попытки пугать картонками и посредственными скримерами вызывают лишь неловкую улыбку) [/spoiler]

[h3] Сюжет [/h3]
С ним тоже не густо, если Вы пришли ради него, смело отматывайте до конца второй главы, ничего не пропустите. Но, то, что сюжет начинается только через час игры - не самое страшное. Бед с сюжетом уйма: Сэмми Лоуренс, самый бесполезный в мире злодей; из ниоткуда взявшийся Борис, который как персонаж буквально никто; а вишенкой на торте является сама завязка игры: "Хмм, в студии нет никого, кроме загадочной машины и изуродованного трупа фурри-собаки, что же делать? Вызвать полицию и бежать отсюда [spoiler] (выход буквально ничего не блокирует) [/spoiler]? Не-е-е, пойду врубать непонятную машину без каких-либо причин, один раз живём, хуле".

[h3] Геймплей [/h3]
90% состоит из одинаковых квестов типа "подай-принеси", что в связке с однообразными коридорами (см. пункт про графику) превращает игру в пытку. Если вы думали, что боёвка вывезет, то, это не так, боёвка так же скучна как и вся игра, регенерация + враги мрущие от одного удара = крайне скучная боёвка, а для хоррора такое - вообще провал.

[h2] Итог [/h2]
Не верьте людям, говорящим, что игра стоит хоть микрограмма вашего внимания, это либо люди, проходившие игру на Ютубе, либо фанаты, сидящие на тяжёлом копиуме.

185807705.review:
J'ai fait le jeu en stream aujourd'hui : je me retrouve bloqué chapitre 3 a cause d'un glitch visiblement très courant et connu qui n'a jamais été patché (le glitch des 5 coeurs au chapitre 3). Je recommence le chapitre depuis le début, histoire d'essayer d'avancer quand même : je me retrouve coincé par le même glitch en ayant les 5 coeurs dans les poches en arrivant à peine à l'étage où je devais les récuperer.

Pas borné du tout : je recommence une nouvelle partie hors stream pour rattraper ce que j'avais fait et pourvoir continuer directement là où j'en étais en stream la prochaine fois ! Bah non. Je me retrouve glitché encore plus tôt (étape des pompes à activer pour récupérer 3 objets à ramener à angel) dans un ascenseur qui refuse de s'ouvrir + menu impossible à fermer. J'ai relancé la partie ET le jeu : je suis toujours emprisonné dans l'ascenseur. J'adore Boris, là n'est pas le problème, mais le jeu pourrait être clairement plus fun (en pouvant y jouer par exemple).

J'ai donc 2 save sur les 3 dispo qui sont impossible à continuer parce que glitchées. Inutile de perdre du temps sur un jeu qui refuse de se laisser jouer.

185697635.review: Bendy and the Ink Machine est un jeu d'horreur et d'aventure captivant qui mêle une ambiance rétro inspirée des dessins animés des années 1930 à un scénario intrigant. L’atmosphère sombre et les énigmes bien conçues maintiennent une tension constante, tout en immergeant le joueur dans un univers mystérieux et inquiétant. Les graphismes au style unique et l’histoire palpitante offrent une expérience immersive, idéale pour les amateurs de frissons et de récits surnaturels. Un excellent choix pour ceux qui recherchent une aventure hors du commun.

185667186.review: Childhood Game Thanks Joey Drew Studios))

185656619.review: All through the game, you will see references to vintage cartoons like Betty Boop and Steamboat Willie. Unlike any other horror game, this one stands out with its unique art style that resembles the animation of 1930s cartoons. The plot is very interesting and has many twists.  The puzzles are created nicely and strike the right notes of difficulty and satisfaction. To make the overall experience even more haunting, the sound design is exceptional and so is the music. Bendy and the Ink Machine has some very memorable characters that add to the lore. In summary, all gamers whether horror or indie would have fun playing ‘Bendy and the Ink Machine’. It's a game that lingers in your mind long after you've finished. Hats off to the developer!

185453553.review:
Прошёл Bendy And The Ink Machine, получив все достижения!
Неплохой лор, хорошие персонажи, интересные аудиозаписи, раскрывающие сюжет и предысторию игры. Советую проходить Bendy And The Ink Machine на все достижения, так получаешь больше удовольствия от данной игры.
В игре присутствует реиграбельность в виде магического зеркала, которым можно пользоваться в пятой главе, и в других главах после прохождения всего сюжета. Магическое зеркало раскрывает секретные надписи и рисунки, которые не видны невооружённым глазом, например при наведении магического зеркала на гробы во второй главе мы сможем увидеть имена сотрудников студий, а в первой главе можно лицезреть надпись на стене "JOEY LIED TO US", написанный на обычной надписи "THE CREATOR LIED TO US", и таких надписей, что-то раскрывающих, предупреждающих, или просто интересных очень много, что создаёт интерес перепроходить Bendy And The Ink Machine.
Сам же Чернильный Демон, он же Бенди, вышел устрашающим персонажем, который присутствует во всех главах данной игры, а в третьей главе и вовсе тревожит на протяжении всего прохождения главы. Бесчувственный и смертоносный зверь без души, жаждущий лишь убивать. Молчаливый и улыбчивый убийца, которого необходимо избегать.
Сама игра хорошая, стиль и рисовка прекрасны, саундтреки хорошие, сюжет интересный, головоломки же показались лёгкими, но неплохими. Битвы с боссами тоже прикольные, но не назвал бы их сложными. Вполне возможно пройти игру без смертей, а при определённых условиях можно и серый фильтр открыть, но открыть серый фильтр не будет лёгкой задачей.
Советую пройти эту игру самим. Мне понравился Bendy And The Ink Machine, хорошая игра.

185263109.review:
Fantastico.
La grafica del gioco, l'originalità dei personaggi, l'originalità della storia, sono un mix di cose che a me, sinceramente, hanno fatto IM-PAZ-ZI-RE!!!
Insomma il gioco, in sè, è una vera bomba.
Ricordo che comprai il gioco insieme a "Bendy and The Dark Revival" e "Boris and The Dark Survival".
Li pagai anche di meno, mi sembra €19,50 tutti e tre questi giochi.
Insomma, un'affarone!
Ma, arrivando al dunque: credo che "Bendy and The Ink Machine" sia uno dei migliori "Puzzle/Horror" Game più belli che ci sia, e credo che l'abbia giocato abbastanza per potervelo consigliare.
Sto scrivendo questa recensione dopo aver appena finito la "Main Story".
Quindi, secondo me, spendere quei 10/20€ per un gioco del genere sia una cosa fantastica da fare!
Spero che questa recensione sia riuscita a levare i dubbi a chiunque ce ne abbia!
Grazie per l'attenzione, e buon gioco!
Ps: Fate attenzione al "Demone dell'Inchiostro"!

185029521.review:
Bendy and the Ink Machine
★ ★ ★ ★ ☆ (4/5)

A Creepy and Captivating Cartoon Nightmare

Playing Bendy and the Ink Machine was like stepping into a dark, twisted cartoon world—and I loved every second of it. The game does an excellent job of blending eerie horror with a nostalgic animation style, making for an unforgettable experience.

What I Loved:

Unique Atmosphere: The 1930s cartoon aesthetic is stunning and perfectly contrasts with the creepy, unsettling tone of the game.
Engaging Story: The mystery of Joey Drew Studios kept me hooked from start to finish. Every chapter revealed just enough to keep me curious without giving too much away.
Chilling Moments: The sudden appearances of Bendy and the eerie sound design had me on edge throughout. It’s not just about jump scares—there’s a constant sense of dread.
Creative Puzzles: The mix of exploration and puzzle-solving added a nice layer of variety to the gameplay.
What Could Be Better:

The combat felt a bit clunky at times, especially during moments where precision was needed.
Some areas involved a bit of backtracking, which slowed the pace in parts.
A few minor glitches, but nothing that ruined the experience for me.
Overall, Bendy and the Ink Machine is a unique horror game that stands out because of its incredible art style and engaging story. If you enjoy creepy adventures with a touch of mystery, this game is definitely worth playing.

Przyjemna gra z wciągającą historią. Tak dobrze łączy kreskówki z dzieciństwa i horroru, że zapomniałem Bendy'ego, że w pewnym momencie była po prostu niewinną postacią telewizyjną, zamienioną w całkowicie nierozpoznawalny potwór. Puzzle, choć czasami frustrujące, były przyjemne do odkrycia, zbieranie wszystkich zup było właściwą ilością trudnej.

Działa nawet na bardzo kiepskim komputerze.
Gorąco polecam fanatykom horrorów. Mimo że wydaje się to proste, skoczki mogą naprawdę zapewnić ci dobre, a przynajmniej pozostawić poczucie niepokoju.

184903276.review:
Summary:
Bendy and the Ink Machine® is the first person puzzle action horror game that will forever ruin your childhood love of cartoons.
-------------------------------
What is in the game:
Single player game with 5 chapters that for the most part is a walking sim but has some puzzles and melee combat.
-------------------------------
Thoughts:
The game is alright if you get it cheap. Gameplay meh but the world and story are intriguing even if it doesnt make much sense if you dont watch some lore video to help you understand after. Each chapter varies in quality but none are really bad. 3 is probably the worst being very fetchquesty.
-------------------------------
Terrible PC Optimization:
On my old computer I played this game on it ran alright if I put the settings on low. Probably just cause it had intergrated graphics but might want a decent pc if you are gonna play this.
-------------------------------
Time to Beat:
took me around 5 hours.
-------------------------------
Price:
☐ Buy it full
☑ Wait for sale
☐ Don't buy it
☐ Free
Game is alright but for the time to beat 20 dollars is a bit much. Wait for a steam sale before buying.
-------------------------------
Graphics:
☐ Amazing
☑ Good
☐ Average
☐ Bad
☐ Awful
Best part of the game. While not as good as dark revival and later games. On high settings I would say this game still holds up well.
-------------------------------
Gameplay:
☐ Very Fun
☐ Fun
☑ Meh
☐ Bad
☐ Awful
Most of the time It is a walking sim. But then there are puzzles to solve that arent really hard. The combat is meh mostly just spamming mouse 1 and walking backwards so they dont hit you. Health regens pretty fast so its never really hard. Just alright gameplay.
-------------------------------
Music:
☐ Amazing
☐ Good
☑ Average
☐ Bad
☐ Terrible
☐ None
Generic horror game music.
-------------------------------
Bugs:
☑ None that ive seen
☐ Not impactful
☐ Negatively affects gameplay
Didnt really see any in my playthrough
-------------------------------
Side-Notes:
None.

184815875.review:
"Bendy and the Ink Machine" is an intriguing game with a lot of potential. The atmosphere is one of its standout features. The nostalgic feeling brought by childhood characters mixed with the dark, ink-covered world is a unique concept that adds a lot of charm to the game. I liked the progression through the different chapters, and I found the art style quite engaging—everything felt deliberately eerie, but in a whimsical, twisted way.

That said, while the atmosphere and story are interesting, the horror aspect didn't hit as hard for me. I didn't experience much of a thrill or fear throughout the game. The tension is there in some parts, but the game didn't manage to scare or excite me like I expected from a horror title. It felt more like a quirky mystery with some mild spooky elements rather than a full-on horror experience.

There were also technical issues that dampened the experience. The most frustrating of these was the save game bug, which has yet to be addressed by the developers. It's a shame, as it really detracts from the overall enjoyment. I was willing to praise the game more for being an indie title with an original concept, however I couldn't help but notice how the developers have seemingly left the game behind, disregarding players' concerns and problems.

184814069.review: The game looks really cool and I like the idea and general concept. It's created a beautiful world but the game itself is just boring.  The enemy interactions are all generic, most of the game is just basic and uninteresting quests and puzzles.  I will say that I am a big fan of puzzle games, but the puzzles in this game just don't feel good, they are just uninteresting and I don't feel rewarded upon completion.  The game just felt like a never-ending drag, nothing about it makes it worth the purchase. If you really want to experience this game to the fullest, go watch someone else play it, for 20 dollars it's just not worth it.  It is infinitely better watching someone like Markiplier play the game, then just playing it yourself.

¡¡alerta de spoilers "leves"!!
el primer capitulo es simple, conciso, directo y da vibras espeluznantes 9/10, el segundo da vibras #nostálgicas" al igual que el primero, pero siento que este con la actualización del capitulo 4 no cambió mucho pero lo siento positivo ya que en el capitulo 1 se sobre saturó un poco con esa actualización,  pero con la actu anteriormente mencionada se solucionaron varios problemas de diseño, pero tiene un problema es que no es tan icónico como el primero y uffff! el puzzle de la música es muy frustrante y cuado uno muere en la persecución de Ink Bendy al reaparecer, uno se desorienta pero tiene algo que nadie supera y eso tiene nombre y se llama Sammy Lawrence XD 7/10. El capitulo 3 es frustrante y tiene un ritmo lento, y no solo es por la sensación que transmite si no, por que si no me equivoco es el capítulo más largo de todos, pero tiene cosas muy positivas como El Proyeccionista, la Tommy's Gun y tiene más momentos  memorables según yo, a comparación del 2do capítulo 4/10. El 4to capítulo tiene momentos algo divertidos como las secciones de el carnaval y la atracción de "terror" y el final es muy bueno pero siento que por culpa de la muerte del Proyeccionista,  este último no pudo ser muy aprovechado y aparte que la sección de la Butcher Gang es muy pero muy mala 6/10.
El 5to y último capítulo es muy épico y tiene cosas como la reaparición de Sammy Lawrence, la pelea final, el final en sí, el "plotwist", el diseño de Bendy, la  primera aparición física de un personaje muy relevante y la relación de amistad de Henry con Tom y Alice Angel, pero la parte de la mano gigante en el río es estresante pero corta e interesante y sobretodo la del laberinto de oficinas con la Butcher Gang es horrible 7/10.

Recomiendo comprarlo: si es un juego con dificultad media, diseño de entorno y personajes atractivo y novedoso para los estandares de la industria, historia atrapante buena jugabilidad y si lo encuentras en descuento es mejor, pero siento que vale más la pena comprarlo en un pack con la secuela o con la secuela y el juego de Boris El Lobo, ya que si lo compras individual quizas te sientas decepcionado.

184393947.review:
Well, it was pretty cool. I'm not going to say it was the most fantastic game I've ever played, but it certainly didn't suck. As I look online, it looks like there's some kind of culture built around this game maybe - it seems, based on some stuff I've read on the internet, that you can be a 'fan' of Bendy series without ever having played it? Is this some kind of weird YouTube thing like FNAF where everyone knows about it without ever having played it? Lol, no idea - I imagine this game will have a lot more appeal to the people already into it, but since I wasn't aware of it before, you're getting the opinion of someone walking in fresh.

In Bendy, you play as Henry, one of the animators of some weird Mickey Mouse/Minnie Mouse/Goofy spin-off. You are in a strange, dark world filled with ink, demons, horrors, and bizarre scenery.

The big appeal of this game is the art and graphics - despite being in 3D, everything has a 'sketched' look to it, which is pretty darn cool. Although the monotone yellowish-blackish gets a little tiring, the art in this game is pretty great, for being meant to resemble sketch art. That was probably the aspect I enjoyed most - the scenery.

Your goal is to escape. You'll wander through the world, completing various tasks and trying to find a way out. The 'puzzles' are not difficult at all - beginner level stuff, so don't expect much of a brain challenge. The main frustration comes from a couple of the boss encounters/running away from bad guy scenes, in which you might die over and over. Some of them got pretty frustrating - especially given that instead of just re-spawning, you have to walk down a dark tunnel of ink towards a bright light in order to respawn. So, it takes time each time you die. However, I made it through, so obviously it's 'do-able.'

I did enjoy the 'story,' such as it was. It didn't strike me as incredibly deep, and I wasn't really 'moved to my core' or anything, but it was a decently fun story. Meant to be a horror game, there isn't a whole lot to be scared of - there are a couple minor jump scares, some monsters, some bizarre imagery, and so on. It really won't shake you to your core, once again.

Art/graphics I loved. Music fit the game, sound effects were pretty darn good, atmosphere was unique and enjoyable.

Worth full price? Hmmm. Maybe, maybe not. I only played 5-ish hours to beat it, so full price is four bucks an hour. The atmosphere, art, and world were very engaging, but still, four bucks an hour is a decent chunk. I got the entire series on sale, and I have seen the series go on sale from time to time. I would say, if you're quite interested in this game, it's probably worth the plunge; if you're not 100% sure, just wishlist it and wait. I think some people will be happy paying full price; I think some people might not.

At any rate, great game, I had a lot of fun, and a little bit of frustration. Loved the art. Great to play through, especially if you can get it on sale.

184306851.review: its amazing, its changed alot from when i first played it when i was younger, but obviously for the better, the story is amazing. tho i had to have the quality way down for it to work for me the graphics where amazing even with low quality setting on, and like i said the story is so compelling and fit seamlessly together through out the chapters, tho the ending was in my opinion slightly underwhelming but still satisfying. the game has a way to compel the player to feel remorse for the unlucky beings in the game, and a way to keep the player on their toes and make them work for the way out, and never revisited a specific type of puzzle or enemy too much, nothing felt repetitive and made me always looking forward to and dreading the next chapter. it also makes it easy to get you attatched to certian characters. but all in all it is a masterpiece of a game and im so glad i revisited it

184176084.review:
I'm deeply conflicted by this game.  It's a visual triumph.  They make it creepy as hell without relying on jumpscares.  The controls are slow and awkward.  I think it's deliberate, like when you're trying to run in a nightmare, but barely move.  It would make a great movie, but it's pretty rough as a game.

I feel like the best way to experience this game is to watch someone else play on YouTube.  

The hiding mechanic feels really random.  Sometimes, it happens when you happen to be near a hiding box and it works.  Other times, there's nowhere to hide, and you're just going to get killed for no reason.

184051565.review: This is my favorite game of all time. The mix of a cartoon style in a 3d space was an amazing idea from theMeatly. I love the characters, I love the idea, I love the story, I love the chapters, chapter 3 was a bit fetchy, but the other chapters are plenty interactive and have many great features that make them stand out. Sure BATDR was a better with new mechanics, special powers, better combat, and better enemies, Bendy And The Ink Machine touches my inky heart in a different way. If you have $20 laying around, please give this game a try, I promise it will not disappoint.

184051013.review: Quelle ambiance, quel univers... Ce n'est pas effrayant, maaais... On ne peut s'empêcher de ressentir un certain malaise, comme un mouton qui arrive dans une forêt infestée de loups. La D.A. et les sons ont exceptionnels, sans parler de l'histoire. Franchement c'est à faire.

184049956.review:
It's a great game with interesting lore, visuals, and music! The whole world looks like a cartoon and it looks generally amazing, being very unique on its own. The music is amazing, adding mystery and character to the world, and references to fan songs in the radios! The lore is interesting, as an abandoned studio with ink flowing through the walls and answers to mysterious disappearances, all tied to the title of the game.

But the game does have some flaws. You can't properly fight without being hit, leaving you in an endless cycle of smack and step back. Chapter Three is a bit boring, leaving you as an errand boy.. and chapter 5 has a looong cutscene. I could go into more detail, but ehh..

Overall, this game is fun, and unique! I'd personally recommend this game, even with its flaws.

184030053.review: Very good and solid game, though at times it can get a bit repetitive with the amount of fetch quests. The combat can also be a bit iffy, but those are really the only problems I have with the game that aren't minor nitpicks. Although the ending's story is a bit hard to follow, I still think the whole story is great and overall holds up well

184025563.review:
Concept: You play as a character named Henry who is invited to the studio he worked at by a friend of his named Joey. You explore through the studio to figure out what happened there and how to escape it. 4/6

Lore: The studio had either created or found a machine that can create creatures made of ink. Because the studio had financial troubles, it decided to use these creatures as a basis to create a some shows about a character named bendy, based off the first creature summoned from the machine. Eventualy, the founder of the studio, joey, and a man named Sammy Laurence went insane, thinking that these creatures were like deities, so they made sacrifices for the demon, turned some people to ink monsters, and even turned themselves into ink monsters. 6/6

Mechanics: In the game, you mostly explore the studio and solve puzzles, but there are occasional moments when you get to fight off some monsters with weapons. Sometimes these fights are boss fights, which are very fun, even the when you don't have weapons, like the final boss in chapter 5. There is also a mechanic with a device that can show invisible ink on walls, which is rarely used, but was interesting while it lasted. 5/6

Visuals: The art style of the game makes everything except the characters look like they are made of paper, which looks pretty cool for some reason, The designs for the characters also looks pretty cool, and makes the creepy characters look even creepier, like evil Boris in chapter 4. +1

Controls: You can use either the WASD or arrow keys to move, you use the mouse to look around, You use the E key to interact, you can use the left click to attack (When you have a weapon), and the right click to activate the device that allows you to see the invisible ink. I like games that have E as the interact button because it is close to the WASD keys, and it goes very nicley with games that are first person. I like that both clicks on the mouse are used because, again, it is very useful to have those buttons for attacking in a first person game. +1

Final remarks: BATIM is a great game for horror game fans for it has a lot of great lore, and is very fun to play in general, with uniwue boss fights and fun puzzles. Total score: 85/100.

184024466.review: This is by far my favorite horror game. The feel of everything is very nostalgic to when i used to be really into it, and i still love it now. Out of all the "Kids mascot turned evil" games, i think this one pulls it off the best, having distorted, inky versions of the characters as monsters. also sammy laurence is the best character.

183722857.review:
[h3] Личный опытик.. [/h3]
Являюсь фанатом данной инди-игрушечки с детства ещё до выхода 4 главы, недавно решил всё таки приобрести лицензированную версию и пройти её на все достижения. Скажу так, игра казуальненькая. 
Сложные ачивки в этой игре принято сообществом считать те, которые связанны со сбором всех банок бекона в каждой главе. Собственно.. не думаю, что это трудно, скорей муторно, нежели сложно. <:T
[h2] О самой игре.. [/h2]
Игра довольна уникальна в плане визуала, который редко где встретишь. Да и оптимизированна она тоже вполне отлично для инди-игры 16-17 года. Единственный момент, когда у меня сильно приседали кадры, так это в 4 главе во время битвы с каруселью.
В плане же хоррора тут не всё так однозначно.. ибо, сказать по правде, напрягается очко лишь в 3 главе, потому-что там есть чернильный Демон, который изредка ходит по этажам и внезапным своим появлением может действительно таки да напугать. А также в той-же 3 главе есть Прожекторист, который тоже дико пугает своим шумом, когда вы играете в первый разочек. 

[b] Вообщем, игра оправдывает свой ценник, но всё же, настоятельно советую прикупить её на распродажах ;) [/b]
